description: Detects specific combinations of encoding methods in the PowerShell command lines
name: Encoded PowerShell Command Line
query: (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND ((process.command_line:(*ToInt* OR *ToDecimal* OR *ToByte* OR *ToUint* OR *ToSingle* OR *ToSByte*) AND process.command_line:(*ToChar* OR *ToString* OR *String*)) OR (process.command_line:*join* AND (process.command_line:*char* OR process.command_line:*split*))))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Vasiliy Burov (rule)
